title: Ratcicle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Freeze a target, Roleblocking them and giving Powerful defense, you may choose to apply only one of the effects.
- Ratcicle's ultimate ability, Done by Slamming its fists to the ground, Ratcicle summons a line of ice crystals that freeze 3 targets, they will be roleblocked and have their defense reduced to vulnerable permanently. (2 uses, shared by non-killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you target a roleblock immune player, you will give them a cold, they will be dealt an astral basic attack unless visited on the next night, they will be notified of this.

desc:
Post 3516
*A blue, bipedal, muscular, rat-like ice mutant with beady eyes, an overbite full of crowded teeth.*
